caption.title: ORR performances of Fe,Mn/N–C in 0.1 M HClO4 and 0.1 M KOH.
caption.p: a LSV curves of Fe,Mn/N–C, Fe/N–C, Mn/N–C and Pt/C catalyst in O 2-saturated 0.1 M HClO 4 solution. b Corresponding Tafel plots obtained from the RDE polarization curves. c H 2O 2 yield and electron transfer number ( n) in 0.1 M HClO 4 solution. d ORR polarization LSV and CV curves of Fe,Mn/N–C measurement before and after 8000 potential cycles at the scan rate of 50 mV s −1 with the rotation speed of 1600 rpm. e Comparison of the kinetic current density ( J k) and E 1/2 of Fe,Mn/N–C, Fe/N–C, Mn/N–C, and Pt/C catalysts.
